tool_description: Evaluates interview responses for content quality, relevance, completeness, and structure using natural language processing techniques.

job_role.description: Target job position for relevance assessment

error_messages: Response-question count mismatch: Ensure responses and questions arrays have the same length
Empty responses array: Provide at least one response to analyze
Invalid evaluation criteria: Use recognized criteria names
Missing job role: Specify the target job position
usage: Provide responses and questions arrays with matching lengths, specify job_role, and optionally set evaluation_criteria. Returns detailed content analysis scores.

content_scores.description: Content quality scores (0-100) for each response
